transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji Deepak sir aawaz aa rahi hai?
Executive: Aa rahi hai sir. Haan ji mai bol raha hu sir video link bhej rakha hu aapko. Aap join ho jao.
Customer: Hello. 15 baje ka time de de ek do minute sir. Sir 15 baje ka time de de quotation bana raha tha.
Executive: Achha sir koi issue nahi hai sir. Mai 15 minute me kar leta hu. bana raha hu zara bhej do phir. Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants time at 3:00 PM.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to call after 15 minutes.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video link, quotation, call time
